ThingDef.label: The 13th Vendemiaire
ThingDef.description:
The 13th Vendemiaire, or in its original technical name, the Mk IV Submunition Projector, is an unsubtle archotech weapon meant for extremely close range ship-boarding actions. In simple terms, it fires a barrage of charged flechettes from a pre-loaded canister affixed to the front of the weapon. When triggered, the flechettes are agitated within the canister and directed outwards, rapidly decomposing into highly unstable pulse charges. This rapid process also limits its range to mere meters, as they lose energy and lethality quickly over distance. Nevertheless, they are devastating in the knife-fight ranges they are employed in, and have sometimes been repurposed against drop-pod assaults and infestations. Brave (or foolish) volunteers would surround the entry point and greet the intruders with a hail of munitions. They would then scoot away after the first volley to begin the cumbersome reloading process of replacing the now spent canister.

Comparisons to ancient muzzle-loaded guns with grapeshot soon followed, thus the Mk IV was christened with its informal designation.

"Give em the ol' whiff o' grapeshot, yer highness. They won't like that. Oh no they wouldn't," - Guardsman "Chungus" Angus, 5432

"Its literally can't kill anything beyond sneezing range. Everything within it though..." Ramone Griffith, unknown.

"Rimworld problems require Rimworld solutions," Greengrow Combat Industries, sales tagline circa 5390
